text: "One Fish, Two Fish, Blowfish, Blue Fish" is the eleventh episode of The Simpsons second season. It first started on the Fox network in the United States on January 24, 1991. In this episode, Homer eats a poisonous fugu fish at a sushi restaurant, and is told that he has only twenty-four hours left to live. He accepts his fate and makes a list of all the things he wants to do before he dies. Some of the things he wanted to do include: Hanging out with Grandpa. == Other websites == * * * Category:1991 television episodes Category:The Simpsons (season 2) episodes
title: One Fish, Two Fish, Blowfish, Blue Fish
